title: Effects of Weaponized Trade on Whiskey, Impact of Coronavirus on Apple’s Supply Chain
itunes:title: Effects of Weaponized Trade on Whiskey, Impact of Coronavirus on Apple’s Supply Chain
description:
Bloomberg News Senior Trade Reporter Shawn Donnan discusses how weaponized trade is rattling the global whiskey business. Bloomberg News Tech Reporter Mark Gurman talks about how Apple’s supply chain is racing for disruption from the coronavirus. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Hedge Fund Reporter Kathy Burton share their insight on macro funds starting to deliver after years of small gains. Bloomberg News Investing Reporter Katia Porzecanski walks through TPG, Sixth Street ending a partnership in a bid to fuel dealmaking. And we Drive to the Close with Dave Donabedian, CIO at CIBC Private Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
